answers.answer: Don't be scared all will be well, I'll keep you in my prayers. Has the doctor confirmed that's what it is?
Call your doctor or go to the er...drink plenty of water as well...but for sure call the doctor
Call ur doc asap preclampsia can cause stillborns

question: So for the past week I have exsperienced headaches everyday and my face and hands have been swollen my blood pressure has been high what should I do? This is my first pregnancy and I'm scared!
title: preeclampsia!!! help!
